summary: Build a premium, high-converting affiliate landing page for the supplement brand “GutOptim” with a clean, modern, trustworthy US-health-brand aesthetic, specific section structure, repeated orange CTAs linking to the provided affiliate URL, and mandated image placements.
architectural_notes: All CTA buttons must link to: https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248
CTA buttons: orange, large/high-contrast; hover state slightly darker orange
Navigation sections: Benefits, How It Works, Reviews, FAQ (smooth scroll)
Images must be consistent (same border radius) and aligned to a clean grid across sections

existing_features.title: Implement a single-page GutOptim affiliate landing page with a premium, clean, trustworthy, modern, conversion-focused design: white background, soft mint/teal accents, modern sans-serif typography, rounded cards, soft shadows, and spacious layout.

Create a sticky header with: left aligned text logo “GutOptim”, a menu linking to on-page anchors (Benefits, How It Works, Reviews, FAQ) with smooth scrolling, and a right aligned orange “Buy Now” button that links to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248.

Build the HERO section (above the fold) with left-side copy and right-side large product image. Use the exact headline and subheadline provided, include 3 trust bullets with icons, and include a prominent orange Buy Now CTA that links to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248. Place the hero image on the right using: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(1)%20(30).jpeg

Add a “Problem → Solution” section describing common gut issues (bloating, gas, discomfort, irregular digestion) and positioning GutOptim as the daily solution, including an orange CTA under the section that links to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248. Use the exact image for this section: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(1)%20(31).jpeg

Add a Benefits section containing 6 benefit cards with exactly the following benefit titles: Supports digestive comfort; Helps reduce bloating & gas; Supports gut balance; Supports healthy routine; Gentle daily support; Works with healthy lifestyle. Place an orange CTA button after the benefits that links to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248. Place the benefits-related image near this section using: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(32).jpeg

Add a “What’s Inside / Formula” section with ingredient-style blocks and a clean premium formula explanation layout (avoid extreme medical promises). Use the exact image for this section: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(1)%20(29).jpeg

Add a “Trust & Quality” section containing 4 badge cards: Quality tested; Secure checkout; Made in controlled facility; Fast shipping. Use the exact image for this section: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(34).jpeg

Add a “Testimonials / Reviews” section with 6 realistic review cards, each showing ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ and short believable experiences (comfort, routine, feeling lighter). Include an orange CTA button under the reviews linking to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248. Use the exact image for this section: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(33).jpeg

Add an FAQ section with 6–8 questions, including: “How to take GutOptim daily?”, “When will I notice results?”, “Is checkout secure?”, and “How do I order?”. Render FAQs in a clean, conversion-friendly expandable layout.

Add a final CTA section with: headline “Take Control of Your Gut Health Today”, urgency line “Limited availability — order now before stock runs out.”, and a big orange Buy Now button linking to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248. Use the exact image for this section: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/gutoptim/images%20(35).jpeg

Ensure every “Buy Now” / “Order Now” CTA across the page uses the same orange primary button style (large, high contrast) with a slightly darker orange hover state, and that every CTA links exactly to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248. CTAs must appear at minimum in: Hero section, after Benefits, after Testimonials, sticky mobile bottom bar, and Final CTA section.

Implement a sticky mobile bottom “Buy Now” bar that is visible on small screens while scrolling, with a prominent orange button linking to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248, without obstructing key content (appropriate spacing/safe-area handling).
Use the provided images with exact section placement and make them visually consistent (same border radius, aligned grid, no random placement).
Optimize for fast loading and clean UX: keep the page lightweight (no unnecessary heavy libraries), ensure responsive layout, and maintain clean spacing with repeated CTAs for conversion.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create GutOptim affiliate landing page with specified high-converting section structure (sticky header, hero, problem/solution, benefits, formula, trust, testimonials, FAQ, final CTA)

Implement required CTA behavior and placement: all Buy/Order buttons orange with hover darker orange; CTAs in hero, after benefits, after testimonials, sticky mobile bottom bar, and final CTA; all link to https://gutoptim24.com/text.php#aff=Nexora_8248
Apply required visual design system: white background with soft mint/teal accents, modern sans-serif, rounded cards, soft shadows, spacious layout, premium clinical trust feel
Use the provided images with exact section placement and consistent styling (same border radius, aligned grid, no random placement)
Add extra conversion features: sticky mobile bottom Buy Now bar, smooth scroll, fast loading, clean spacing/no clutter, repeated CTAs
